General.Name: Base Carbon Inc
General.Description: Base Carbon Inc., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the provision of capital, development expertise, and management operating resources to projects involved primarily in voluntary carbon markets and the broader environmental markets. The company was formerly known as 1287411 B.C. Ltd. and changed its name to Base Carbon Inc. in February 2022. Base Carbon Corp. is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 18 King Street West, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5C 1C4
